Markets

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

##  Engineering Tomorrow’s Circular Supply Chain
Every solution we deliver is grounded in precision, automation, and technical depth — because true impact isn’t improvised, it’s designed.
![Engineering Tomorrow’s Circular Supply Chain](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201440%20810'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### In-House R&D
#### 01
Our platforms aren’t off-the-shelf — they’re engineered from the ground up by Reconext’s own development teams. From robotics to diagnostics, we build the tools we wish existed. 
### Design for Serviceability
#### 02
We work with customers to improve how products are built, not just how they’re repaired. By informing design with repair data, we reduce complexity, lower failure rates, and extend product lifespans. 
### Testing Automation
#### 03
Reconext automates functional, cosmetic, and component-level testing across thousands of SKUs. This ensures speed, accuracy, and consistency in even the most complex product environments. 
### Fully Integrated Automation
#### 04
Whether you’re processing hundreds or hundreds of thousands, our platforms scale to meet the demand without compromise.
### Real-Time Data & Reporting
#### 05
Every asset we process is tracked, tested, and verified with real-time digital records. Customers gain instant access to device status, audit trails, and performance insights. 
### Built for What’s Next
#### 06
Our platforms are designed to adapt — supporting new chipsets, form factors, and protocols as they emerge. Whether it’s IoT, wearables, or enterprise infrastructure, we stay ahead so our partners can too.

###  Security Without Blind Spots
![eye](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![eye](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Most providers accept visibility gaps. We engineered them out.
Our always-on, fully digital system gives you complete oversight — from intake to outcome — with no blind spots. We call it Continuous Custody Intelligence.
<
=
### On-Site Profiling before transport begins
#### 01/
Each asset is scanned, logged, and digitally fingerprinted at the source — so visibility starts before movement does.
### Real-Time Oversight during secure transfer
#### 02/
Live data feeds and intervention protocols ensure every handoff is tracked — and nothing disappears in transit.
### Physical Isolation that exceeds compliance standards
#### 03/
Devices are compartmentalized by status, customer, and data sensitivity — with enforced physical boundaries at every stage.
### Component-Level Lineage tracking even through transformation
#### 04/
We maintain traceability even when devices are disassembled — recording serial-level chain of custody across harvested parts.
### Cross-System Data Integration with hard-stop verification
#### 05/
CCI integrates with client systems and our own — enforcing stop points when documentation, verification, or compliance flags are missing.
### Scenario-Based Personnel Testing to prevent human failure
#### 06/
Our security isn’t just digital — we stress-test human processes with real-world simulations to catch breakdowns before they happen.

###  How We Work With You
A Lifecycle Partnership Built on Precision, Trust, and Scale

# Join our team
At Reconext we believe that the key to our success is our people, and that teamwork and supporting each other delivers the best results. 
Together we work to develop processes and solutions that deliver value and that meet our customers’ ever-evolving needs. We do this by acknowledging the unique contribution each of us makes to our success and learning from each other.
[Open positions](https://careers.reconext.com/jobs)[How we hire](https://careers.reconext.com/#list-c585f82f)
## Redefining the lifecycle of electronics
Headquartered in Grapevine, Texas, with a footprint covering The Americas, Europe & Asia Pacific we deliver value to customers through innovative aftermarket device services and reverse supply chain solutions to industry-leading OEMs, cable, satellite, and mobile device operators, retailers, insurers, and other enterprises. 
[Learn more](https://www.reconext.com/about-us/)
## Our People
Reconext brings together people from around the world to help create and provide solutions that promote circularity for electronic devices. We take pride in actively fostering a culture of inclusion and diversity where all are treated fairly and with respect.
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/Ax19/XrDlnB09GYaT.jpeg)
###  Reconext offers **competitive benefits**
####  ... and **so much more**!
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/A0Qb/3ROZS10seF5b.jpeg)
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/A0Qe/aEtF3eJT2wQy.jpeg)
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/A0Qc/LmTbAmu6Xs5g.jpeg)
## Our Mission
As a **services company** , our mission is to deliver solutions that **enable our customers** to meet their objectives by**optimizing the value** of returned electronic devices with the goal of **100% reuse of all materials**. We accomplish this through continuous innovation in repair, remanufacturing, refurbishment, reclamation and remarketing technologies.
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/Ayej/aA_G8_aDmUPL.png)
## Our Vision
To be the **premier aftermarket services company** benefiting our **customers** , the **communities** in which we operate and the **environment**.
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/A0Qd/bCov00zn7D9E.jpeg)
## Join the Team at One of Reconext's Global Locations
## What to Expect: The Reconext Hiring Process
Our hiring process is thorough, to ensure we make the right decision and to help you to decide if we're the right fit for you.
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/Ay2v/W6yg9IKZVC5v.png)

In the first call, let our recruiter learn about you and your story to check a potential fit to Reconext.This is also a chance for you to ask first questions about the role and company.
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/Ay2w/hY0SgoFrW2cj.png)
### Manager’s discussions
In these meetings, your future leaders take a deeper dive into your experience and what you could bring to the team. You can expect questions on how knowledgeable you are in the business or technology area. 
![](https://careers.recruiteecdn.com/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto,w_1920,c_limit/production/images/Ay2x/upcYYj39z9Ev.png)
### Final chat

Markets
Markets
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#  About Reconext
## We believe the most sustainable product is the one that already exists.
Every day, millions of devices are retired before their potential runs out. At Reconext, we help the world’s leading technology companies recover that potential safely, responsibly, and at scale. We keep products in use, materials in circulation, and trust intact across global supply chains.
[Join us5](https://careers.reconext.com/)
[Read up5](https://www.reconext.com/generating-value-when-others-see-none/?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=paid&utm_campaign=thought_leader&utm_content=precision_recovery_blog)
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/about-detect-ico.svg)
See how our engineering teams recover value systems can’t detect.
[ Learn more ](https://www.reconext.com/generating-value-when-others-see-none/)
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/about-supply-ico.svg)
Discover how we partner with innovators to build circular supply chains.
[ Learn more ](https://www.reconext.com/reconext-ceo-shahriyar-rahmati-all-things-circular/)
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/about-protect-ico.svg)
Learn how we protect data through every stage of recovery.
[ Learn more ](https://www.reconext.com/the-invisible-fortress-digital-chain-of-custody-done-right/)
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/about-recovery-system-ico.svg)
Explore the tools behind our high-yield recovery systems.
[ Learn more ](https://www.reconext.com/test-solutions/)
###  Our story started with a repair bench
In 1983, a small repair shop in Frankfurt began fixing televisions. That hands-on mindset –curiosity, patience, precision – has stayed with us through every stage of growth. Over four decades, we evolved through Teleplan, Valutech, and Clover Wireless, learning every side of recovery: repair, logistics, reuse, and remarketing. In 2020, those strengths came together under one name: Reconext.
[Read our full story](https://www.reconext.com/teleplan-and-clover-wireless-rebrand-as-reconext/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201000%20667'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201000%20667'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Leadership commitment
At Reconext, leadership means showing up for our customers, our teams, and the work itself. We stay close to the details, make decisions that last, and take responsibility when it matters most.
[ Meet our executive team ](https://www.reconext.com/about-us/executive-leadership-team/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201000%20667'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guided by our values
Our values shape how we work, how we lead, and how we treat each other. They show up in every repair, every decision, and every partnership – the everyday actions that keep trust strong and progress real.
[ See our values ](https://www.reconext.com/what-reconext-stands-for-turning-challenges-into-customer-value/)
###  What we do
We build and run recovery systems that give technology a longer life. Our work protects data, preserves materials, and brings value back into circulation. From returns management and testing to repair, recovery, and trade-in programs, we help customers reach their sustainability goals while improving the bottom line.
[Learn more about our services ](https://www.reconext.com/lifecycle-services/)

#### Consumer Electronics

Markets
Markets
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#  Executive  Leadership  Team 
![Shahriyar Rahmati](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Shahriyar.png)
#### Shahriyar Rahmati
##### Chief Executive Officer
Shahriyar is the CEO of Reconext and is also a member of the Board of Directors. Shahriyar has over 25 years of experience in operations, finance, strategy and technology.
He has held senior leadership positions in private companies in both the US and Europe at businesses spanning several industries with a core focus on electronic materials, supply chain & logistics, and the application of technology to value creation.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/usa99/)
![Greg Baroni](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/greg-baroni-expanded-bg.png)
#### Greg Baroni
##### Chief Financial Officer
Greg brings a background in Big 4 auditing, investment banking, and private equity portfolio companies. His expertise lies in driving company-wide change to enhance operational excellence and strategic decision-making.
He is focused on implementing financial metrics and internal controls that provide critical insights into financial and operational performance, enabling profitable growth and informed capital allocation.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/greg-baroni-jd-cpa-757a24142/)
![Bobby Singh](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/bobby-singh.jpeg)
#### Bobby Singh
##### Chief Operating Officer
Bobby is known for creating win-win outcomes through a value-chain approach and a deep commitment to operational excellence.
He leads efforts to streamline supply chains, optimize efficiency, and embed LEAN principles across global operations.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bobby-singh-b256b04/)
![Richard X. Fischer](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/richard-x-fischer.png)
#### Richard X. Fischer
##### Chief Administration Officer
Rich joined Reconext in 2012 as the EVP and general counsel. He is the Chief Administrative Officer and General Counsel of Reconext, and is responsible for the company’s legal, government affairs, communications and human resources functions worldwide.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/richard-fischer-29a06710/)
![Shoab Khan](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/shoab-khan.png)
#### Shoab Khan
##### Chief Technology Officer
Shoab brings 20 years of experience in technology across various industries. He has a strong track record of leading digital transformation, leveraging AI and advanced analytics to drive operational efficiency and business growth.
At Reconext, Shoab is focused on unifying global operations under a single technology platform, optimizing shop-floor performance, and delivering actionable insights for customers and internal teams.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shoabkhan/)
![Arash Beheshtian](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/arash-beheshtian.png)
#### Arash Beheshtian
##### SVP, Global Supply Chain
Arash brings over 20 years of experience in supply chain strategy, operations research, and decision intelligence. He has led complex global initiatives across logistics, procurement, and planning, combining quantitative tools with practical execution.
At Reconext, Arash is focused on building scalable, data-informed supply chain solutions that improve efficiency, enhance resilience, and align closely with customer priorities.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arash-beheshtian-85058662/)
![Chaim Sash](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20415%20311'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Chaim Sash
##### Chief Marketing Officer
Chaim brings experience in customer-centric solutions and technology to his leadership. He is focused on aligning Reconext’s value stream with the evolving priorities of its global customers to ensure clear communication and long-term strategic alignment that highlights both economic and sustainability value.
Chaim drives growth opportunities for customers while strengthening the connection between Reconext and its partners.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/chaimsash/)
![Su Khaing](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20768'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Su Khaing
##### SVP, Global Controller & Treasurer
Su is a seasoned finance leader with a proven track record in managing global financial operations and driving enterprise-wide improvements in compliance, transparency, and process efficiency. She brings deep expertise in GAAP and IFRS, M&A integration, ERP implementation, treasury management, and operational standardization across a wide range of industries.
In her current role at Reconext, Su is focused on strengthening financial systems and controls that support scalable growth. She is committed to enhancing reporting accuracy, improving financial visibility, and enabling data-driven decision-making across the enterprise.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/su-khaing-9180ab7/)
![Nick Linford](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20415%20311'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Nick Linford
##### EVP of Global CPE and Networking
Nick Linford, EVP of Global CPE and Networking, has 42 years of experience in the electronics industry, spanning Manufacturing, Operations, and After Market Services, with a focus on Defence, CPE, and Consumer Electronics.
Since joining Reconext in 2010, he has led the development of the CPE vertical in Europe, now one of the region’s leading service providers.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nick-linford-b98182a/)
![Aivar Elbrecht](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20415%20311'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Aivar Elbrecht
##### Global Director Of Innovation
Aivar leads Reconext’s global engineering team, developing proprietary automation platforms and custom testing technologies that power device recovery at scale.
With expertise in systems design, high-mix automation, and serviceability engineering, he and his team are behind tools which are deployed in hundreds of locations worldwide.
[  ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aivar-elbrecht-4a115b11/)
###  What We Stand For
![Customer Success Above All](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2034'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Customer Success Above All
We don’t just manage accounts, we champion them. Your KPIs are our KPIs.
![Long-Term Mindset](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Long-Term Mindset
We’re not built for short-term wins. We invest in enduring partnerships and continuous innovation.
![Clear Accountability](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2034'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Clear Accountability
Our executive team is engaged and responsive, sitting in on key cross-company meetings to keep projects aligned.
![Sustainability That Scales](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2041'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Sustainability That Scales
We believe circularity begins at design, and we’re building the infrastructure to support it globally.
![Operational Excellence](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2034'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Operational Excellence
Decades of experience in manufacturing, tech, and logistics inform every process we touch.
![Innovation in Practice](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Innovation in Practice
Our R&D is customer-driven and market-aware, from automation to AI to advanced testing.
![Visible During Escalations](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Visible During Escalations
When it matters most, we show up. Our leadership is accessible during critical moments — not behind closed doors.
![Security Without Compromise](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2054'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Security Without Compromise
From chain-of-custody systems to in-house tooling, we architect trust into every solution.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

Markets

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

Markets
Markets

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/data-commission-ico.svg)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Markets

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.

#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.

#  Bydgoszcz, Poland The largest electronics recovery center in Central & Eastern Europe
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico-1.svg)
### Total Facility Size
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/employee-ico-1.svg)
### Employees
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/counties-ico.svg)
### Countries served
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/global-ico-1.svg)
### Global Certifications
From our state-of-the-art Bydgoszcz facility, we help global brands recover more value from their electronics – repairing, refurbishing, and redeploying devices with unmatched scale, automation, and security. 
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202880%202634'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  Over 20 years of  electronics recovery  leadership
_Since 2001, Reconext Bydgoszcz has grown into the largest service center of its kind in Central and Eastern Europe. With more than 1,100 skilled employees, our site combines scale with specialization, providing advanced recovery for consumer electronics, enterprise storage, POS devices, and CPE equipment._
_Strategically located in Poland, Bydgoszcz is tightly integrated into Reconext’s European and global network, offering customers faster turnaround, consistent quality, and shared best practices across borders._
##  Automation-driven recovery at scale
Bydgoszcz isn’t just large — it’s advanced. The site has invested heavily in automation, robotics, and secure infrastructure to deliver faster, more consistent outcomes for customers.
###  From this facility, our teams:
Deliver pan-European recovery for set-top boxes, modems, and CPE devices.
Lead in secure payment terminal repair with a certified key-loading room.
Manage high-volume LCD display recovery for global OEMs.
Support large-scale programs for telecom, retail, and enterprise partners.
Collaborate closely with our Prague team to pioneer new recovery methods and technology rollouts.
##  How We  Help You Win
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Make returns easy
Efficient returns management and logistics coordination across Europe.
![Keep parts flowing](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2051%2044'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Automated grading and diagnostics with Titan, Optiline, Proteus, and more.

### Repair and refurbish
Full L1–L3 repair capabilities, from cosmetic refurbishment to component-level BGA rework.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Manage spare parts 
Parts harvesting, sourcing, and reverse logistics at scale.
![Bring devices back to life](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Protect data and devices 
Certified secure processes for payment terminals, HDDs/SSDs, and connected devices.
![Bring devices back to life](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2055'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Recover more value 
Reclamation and resale pathways that extend product lifecycles.
##  Who we serve  and what we handle
Bydgoszcz partners with leading organizations across telecommunications providers, global OEMs, consumer electronics brands, retailers, contract manufacturers, payment technology companies, enterprise IT providers, and design/manufacturing partners.
###  We Process
  * ![Computing devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Set-Top Boxes / CPE
Testing, repair, and refurbishment of set-top boxes, gateways, and modems for major European operators.
  * ![Computing devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### POS & Payment Terminals
Secure, PCI PIN & P2PE-certified processing, from diagnostics and component-level repair to secure key loading.
  * ![POS & payment systems](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2044%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### HDDs & SSDs
Screening, grading, and value recovery using Proteus and other advanced test tools.

#### LCD Displays
In- and out-of-warranty repairs for screens 14″–49″, with new programs launching for 65″, 75″, and 85″.
  * If it has a screen, chip, or circuit — we handle It
  * ![Industrial & solar ](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2051%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Storage Systems
Total recovery and component reuse for enterprise IT infrastructure.
  * ![Computing devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Printers, Cameras, Mobiles, Laptops & Accessories 
Comprehensive repair, refurbishment, and parts harvesting to extend lifecycles and reduce e-waste.


###  Always-on Security
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Certified to ISO 27001, PCI PIN, P2PE, WEEELABEX, and R2v3, Bydgoszcz meets the highest standards for information security and supply chain integrity. With layered physical and digital protections, every device is safeguarded from arrival to redeployment.
![People on Watch](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2052%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### People on Watch
24/7 on-site security officers and controlled access to all production areas.
![Eyes Everywhere](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Eyes Everywhere
CCTV coverage across the facility, with monitoring inside and outside.
![Tight Access](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2058'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Tight Access
Metal detectors, secure inbound/outbound docks, and a PCI PIN & P2PE-certified secure room for payment terminals.
![Data Lockdown](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2043%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Data lockdown
Certified handling of data-bearing devices in restricted zones, with audit-ready erasure and destruction.
##  Environmental Responsibility
Bydgoszcz was built with sustainability in mind. The site is BREEAM-certified and powered in part by an on-site solar PV installation. Our teams follow a reuse-first approach, extending product lifecycles through repair, refurbishment, and parts reclamation before considering recycling. Hazardous materials are dismantled under strict EU regulations, ensuring safe handling and zero uncontrolled landfill.
![Certified handling](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2048%2055'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### BREEAM-certified

##  A look inside  our Bydgoszcz operations 
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
From Bydgoszcz, customers across Central and Eastern Europe benefit from rapid turnaround, lower logistics costs, and direct integration into Reconext’s global recovery network.
###  Your automation  questions 
##### What automation solutions are in use at Bydgoszcz? 
We use a full suite of automated systems — including Titan, Optiline, ICT, Proteus, Colossus, and robotic serial scanning — to speed up testing, improve accuracy, and lower costs.
##### Can you securely process payment terminals? 
Yes. Our certified secure room meets PCI PIN and P2PE standards, with restricted access and dedicated security procedures for key loading.
##### Do you support pan-European recovery programs? 
Absolutely. We provide in- and out-of-warranty recovery across 30+ countries, supported by multilingual staff and strong logistics integration.
##### Can you provide data erasure certificates? 
Yes. All data-bearing devices are processed in line with ISO 27001, NIST 800-88 Rev1, and IEEE 2883 standards, with full audit logs and destruction certificates available upon request.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#  Calexico, California Where U.S.–Mexico tech moves faster
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico-1.svg)
### Facility
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/global-ico-1.svg)
### Global certifications
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/sla-ico.svg)
###### Same-day SLAs
### For high-volume customers
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/units-recover-ico.svg)
###### 1M+
### Units recovered
From our cross-dock in Calexico, Reconext accelerates recovery and logistics for the world’s leading industries. We handle secure intake, repackaging, fulfillment, and cross-border transfers with speed, precision, and compliance.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201501%202000'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  The gateway to Mexicali
_Calexico is Reconext’s U.S. cross-dock hub feeding into our two Mexicali Service Centers, Gómez Morín and Tecnomex. Every unit, part, or shipment entering Mexico passes through here — inspected, relabeled, kitted, and cleared. Its border location reduces transit time, strengthens compliance, and keeps customer programs moving without delay._
##  A hub built for speed and trust
Delivered same-day turnaround on critical SLAs for leading enterprises.
Seamlessly integrates with Mexicali facilities for end-to-end recovery and redeployment.
Supported programs across IT, consumer electronics, telecom, and ecommerce.
Achieved zero audit nonconformances in 2024 under ISO standards.
##  How We  Help You Win
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Receive & ship fast
Efficient intake and outbound flows.
![Keep parts flowing](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Keep devices moving 
Cross-dock transfers direct to Mexicali sites.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Repackage & fulfill
Custom kitting and fulfillment programs.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Protect your brand 
Secure data wiping and certified scrap destruction.
##  Who We Serve  and What We Handle
Calexico supports OEMs, technology enterprises, ecommerce providers, and telecom service operators — organizations that depend on cross-border precision and compliance.
###  We Process

###  Find Us
From Calexico, customers tap directly into Reconext’s North American recovery network. Every shipment flows seamlessly into Mexicali for advanced repair and refurbishment, with visibility and control maintained end-to-end.
###  Your Calexico  questions answered 
##### What is a cross-dock facility and how does it work?
A cross-dock is where products are received, sorted, and shipped out without long-term storage. At Calexico, we relabel, kit, and process goods for fast transfer into Mexicali recovery facilities.
##### Why is Calexico important for U.S.–Mexico logistics?
Its location on the border streamlines customs, compliance, and transfer into Mexicali sites, reducing transit delays and lowering total logistics costs.
##### How fast are orders processed? 
We maintain strict SLAs, with same-day turnaround for multiple programs and 1–3 day TAT on others.
##### Does Calexico handle secure data destruction? 
Yes. Data-bearing devices are wiped on-site using certified methods, and noncompliant units are physically destroyed.

#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. ##  A secure U.S. hub for  recovery and fulfillment
_Located in the Dallas–Fort Worth region, Grapevine provides the scale, talent, and compliance framework required by global customers. With repair labs, accredited security, and direct-to-consumer fulfillment capability, the site strengthens Reconext’s U.S. presence while linking into our global recovery network._
##  Delivering measurable outcomes
Grapevine has grown into one of Reconext’s most capable U.S. operations.
Achieved PCI PIN and P2PE certification, enabling secure payment device processing
Deployed Maya and Proteus to improve testing accuracy and protect sensitive data
Scaled to support B2B and direct-to-consumer fulfillment, reducing turnaround for customers
Built a 424-person workforce to deliver quality and consistency at scale
Integrated into Reconext’s global programs for consistent execution across regions

##  A look inside 
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
The Grapevine Service Center is located in the Dallas–Fort Worth area, positioned for rapid distribution across North America. The site integrates directly with Reconext’s global recovery network, including program synergy with Prague for global OEM customers.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### How quickly can Grapevine launch a new program? 
New workflows typically start with a pilot build. Grapevine’s engineering team validates test codes and QA processes before ramping to steady state. Most customer pilots are launched within weeks, not months.
##### Does Grapevine provide customer-facing reporting? 
Yes. The site delivers serialized inventory data, repair yields, turnaround time metrics, and carbon savings reporting. These dashboards can be customized or integrated into customer systems.
##### What makes PCI scope important for a site like Grapevine? 
PCI PIN and P2PE certifications allow Grapevine to handle payment devices without risk of compliance gaps. Many providers require this to process or refurbish POS terminals inside the U.S.
##### Can customers audit Grapevine on site? 
Yes. Customers frequently conduct on-site audits, virtual walk-throughs, and security reviews. Grapevine maintains full documentation to support compliance checks.
##### How does Grapevine coordinate with other Reconext facilities? 
Programs are often split across geographies — with Grapevine managing U.S. repair and fulfillment while partner sites handle Europe or LATAM flows. Processes and reporting are standardized so customers see one consistent view.

#### Consumer Electronics

#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

#  Havant, United Kingdom Where telecom and electronics get a second life 
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico-1.svg)
### Facility
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/employee-ico.svg)

###### ISO 9001
### Certified
With decades of heritage at Langstone Park and a 2024 relaunch, Reconext’s Havant Service Center is built to serve Europe’s leading telecom operators, electronics manufacturers, and IT providers. Combining proven expertise with modern operations, Havant delivers secure and sustainable recovery at scale. 
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  Built for scale,  ready for change 
_Havant is a relaunched hub with deep engineering roots and a renewed focus on circular recovery. The 4,000 m² site manages high-volume programs for set-top boxes, POS devices, and consumer electronics while piloting new service lines. Its position on the UK’s south coast ensures rapid turnaround for domestic customers and seamless integration into Reconext’s wider European network._
##  Proven performance, relaunched for today 
Havant builds on decades of recovery expertise while operating as one of Reconext’s newest facilities. Since reopening in 2024, the site has: 
Delivered reliable recovery across telecom and consumer electronics. 
Integrated renewable energy and on-site solar generation into operations.
Passed ISO 9001 certification audit, with ISO 14001 targeted for 2025. 
Established itself as Reconext’s UK anchor for European programs.

###  Always-on  Protection
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Every data-bearing device in Havant is processed under tightly controlled conditions. The site operates with ISO 9001 certification and follows Reconext’s global ISO 27001 standards for data handling. Data erasure is performed to NIST 800-88 Rev1, DoD 5220.22-M, and other customer-specified standards, with certificates of destruction provided for non-wipeable devices 
![People on Watch](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2052%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Security-trained personnel with access-controlled zones.

Continuous CCTV and intrusion detection coverage. 
![Tight Access](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2058'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Intrusion detection, access controls, and fire safety systems.

### Data Lockdown
Certified secure data erasure and physical destruction for non-wipeable devices. 
##  Built on responsible recovery 
Havant runs on 100% renewable electricity, including power generated from on-site solar panels. Any surplus is sold back into Langstone Park at the same kWh rate, reinforcing the site’s commitment to sustainable operations. 
![Cosmetic reconditioning](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

##  A look inside  our Havant operations

###  Find Us
Based in Havant on England’s south coast, customers benefit from established logistics channels and coordinated support across global recovery operations. 
###  Your Recovery  Questions, Answered
##### Can customers audit the Havant site? 
Yes. Reconext offers on-site or virtual audits so customers can verify processes, security, and compliance firsthand.
##### Does Havant support custom testing requirements?
It does. The site can adapt its diagnostic platforms and reporting to meet customer-specific standards for telecom and consumer devices.
##### What happens if a device cannot be refurbished?
Non-recoverable assets are responsibly dismantled, with parts harvested for reuse and the remainder processed through certified recycling partners.
##### Does Havant integrate with customer systems?
Yes. Reporting and order management can connect directly into customer ERPs and portals for seamless program visibility.
##### How flexible is Havant’s workforce capacity?
The site scales with demand, using cross-trained staff and proven workflows to handle seasonal peaks without compromising quality.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

### Accuracy maintained for RL program
From our logistics hub in Hong Kong, we keep enterprise network and storage customers supplied, compliant, and in control. With a small but seasoned team, the site manages warehousing, fulfillment, and value recovery with unmatched accuracy.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201040%201400'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  At the gateway of Asia 
_Established in 2008, Reconext Hong Kong is the ideal location for pan-Asia service parts distribution. Its role is to consolidate returns, manage inventory, and keep OEMs compliant with global standards. The site operates with a small but highly experienced team, fluent in English, Cantonese, and Mandarin, and has a track record of excellence in audit results and operational stability._
##  A track record built on precision 
Reconext Hong Kong has proven itself as one of the most reliable logistics hubs in Asia. With a focus on accuracy, stability, and compliance, the site consistently delivers results that OEMs can trust.
240,000 units processed annually
28,000 ft² warehouse with 900 pallet high-rack capacity
100% inventory accuracy for Cisco RL program over multiple years
Cisco security and trade compliance audits passed 
2017 Sustainability Award for responsible operations
2024 Global Cisco Excellence in Logistics Award — recognized for outstanding APAC logistics performance
Core team with 12+ years average tenure

Strategically located for pan-Asia distribution, Hong Kong integrates with Reconext’s global network to deliver fast, compliant support across APAC.
###  Your Recovery  Questions, Answered
##### Why use Hong Kong instead of Shenzhen or Suzhou?
Hong Kong is built for logistics, warehousing, and trade compliance — not large-scale repair. It complements Reconext’s production sites by consolidating returns and moving parts quickly across APAC.
##### What is the site’s processing capacity?
Hong Kong manages ~240,000 units annually with 28,000 ft² of warehouse space and 900 pallet high-rack capacity.
##### Does Hong Kong support custom reporting or tracking?
Yes. All inventory is serialized and managed in the IFS ERP system, providing customers with full transparency and custom reporting. 
##### Can the site handle secure data-bearing devices?
Yes. The team performs HDD screening, data erasure, and functional testing, with certified wipe and controlled destruction if required.
##### How fast are consolidation and fulfillment services?
Standard processing is 1–2 business days, with faster turnaround available for critical orders.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

At our Irving Service Center, we focus on high-value storage, networking, and consumer devices. With certified processes, advanced board-level repair, and seamless integration with Reynosa, Irving ensures that complex repair work starts right and scales securely.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201200%20554'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  A focused U.S. hub for  storage and networking
_Irving is built for precision. From HDD/SSD recovery to networking hardware and connected devices, the site combines skilled board-level repair with secure data handling. Its role as a feeder site into Reynosa adds scalability, helping global customers balance U.S.-based expertise with Mexico’s high-volume capacity._
##  Delivering results through specialization
Over two decades of operation, Irving has carved out a niche as a secure, specialized repair hub.
Expanded board-level repair and PCBA rework capabilities for storage and networking gear
Supported global HDD/SSD recovery programs with serialized wipe and refurbishment
Maintained 100% compliance record in customer and certification audits
Seamlessly transitioned high-volume work into Reynosa for scaling
Established a strong technical workforce with long-tenured expertise in advanced repair

###  Find Us
The Irving Service Center is located in the Dallas–Fort Worth metro area, positioned to support U.S. customers directly while integrating with Reynosa for cross-border scaling.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### When should a program start in Irving vs. moving straight to Reynosa? 
Use Irving to stand up complex flows—storage, networking, or board-level repair—prove test codes/QA, then transfer volume to Reynosa with the same processes and reporting.
##### Can Irving provide unit-level proof of data handling for drives? 
Yes, Irving supports serialized wipe logs and, where customer policy requires, certificates/attestations for erasure or physical destruction.
##### What happens to HDD/SSD units that fail erasure or test? 
They’re removed from reuse, physically destroyed under controlled procedures, and sent to accredited downstream partners with traceable records.
##### How do you reduce “no-fault-found” (NFF) on networking returns? 
Failure analysis, validated test codes, configuration checks, and run-in testing to catch intermittent faults before redeploy.
##### Can reporting plug into our systems? 
Yes, Irving delivers serialized device and QA data and can integrate via the formats/protocols agreed during onboarding.
