#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.

### Global certifications
From our secured site in Greater Jakarta, Reconext supports telecom operators, electronics OEMs, and enterprise customers with testing, repair, refurbishment, and value recovery. With certified hazardous waste handling and 18+ years of leadership continuity, Jakarta ensures compliant, high-quality results for domestic and regional customers.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20724%201014'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  An experienced hub for  telecom and consumer repair
_Operating since 2007, Reconext Jakarta provides secure, certified repair services for telecommunications infrastructure, IT equipment, and consumer electronics. The site is located in BizPark 3 Commercial Estate with 24/7 security, ESD-protected repair areas, and a warehouse for component management._
_With a skilled workforce covering multiple languages and ethnic backgrounds, Jakarta combines cultural diversity with deep engineering expertise to deliver quality service for regional and global programs._
##  Recognized performance,   
sustained quality
Jakarta’s long-running telecom and electronics programs are backed by certified systems and repeat customer recognition.
Telecom customer recognition awards in 2008, 2019, & 2023
ISO 9001 & 14001 audit passes year over year
Multi-country shipments enabled via licensing and logistics flows

###  Always-on protection
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Jakarta operates within a secured industrial estate and follows strict access controls to protect high-value and data-bearing devices. All erasure is performed using certified processes, with non-erasable media physically destroyed on site. Every step is logged for auditability.
![People on Watch](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2052%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### People on Watch 
24/7 guard presence at BizPark one-gate estate
![Eyes Everywhere](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Eyes Everywhere
SECOM alarm monitoring, continuous CCTV, and motion detection
![Tight Access](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2058'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Tight Access
Badge-controlled doors, visitor check-in, and secure repair zones
![Data Lockdown](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Data Lockdown
Certified secure data erasure available with audit logs and certificates on request
##  Certified to reduce impact
Jakarta is certified to ISO 14001 Environmental Management and ISO 9001 Quality, and operates a reuse-first approach that extends product life while minimizing waste. Hazardous materials are managed by certified staff under a documented Waste Management Procedure.
![Certified handling](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2046%2028'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Packaging 
Wooden pallets and cartons reused for returns shipments; LED lighting installed to cut energy use
![High repair yields](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2046%2053'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Hazardous materials
Toxic and battery components processed under strict hazardous-waste protocols by certified handlers
![Solar & energy programs](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Reuse focus
~9% diversion rate achieved through reuse and recycling initiatives
![Employee training](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2055'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Future goals 
Ongoing improvements to material reuse and reporting, with further efficiency upgrades planned

##  A look inside 
Load More Media 
###  Strategically positioned. Regionally connected. 
From our secure site in Bekasi, just outside Jakarta, customers across Southeast Asia gain faster turnaround, lower logistics costs, and direct access to Reconext’s worldwide network.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### Can you integrate with our ERP/VPN for secure data exchange? 
Yes—B2B connections from Reconext ERP to customer ERP are supported, with secure VPN connectivity available. 
##### How do you handle hazardous and toxic components? 
Certified staff follow documented hazardous-waste procedures; chain-of-custody documentation can be provided on request (site reported).
##### What does “in-country” repair really enable in Indonesia? 
It avoids restrictions on cross-border movement of used equipment, enabling faster, compliant service for domestic customers. 
##### How do you ramp new device families?
We pilot on controlled lines (BGA/diagnostics capacity), then scale via work-instruction release, training matrices, and QA sign-offs—without impacting existing SLAs (site approach).
##### Can you stage spares or provide buffer stock for telecom modules? 
Yes—parts planning, sourcing/harvesting, and fulfilment can stage inventory to your policy levels.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.

#  McAllen, Texas Where cross-border speed meets secure storage
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico-1.svg)
### Facility
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/high-storage-ico.svg)
### Storage capacity
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/unit-ico.svg)
### Library rack capacity
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/door-ico.svg)
###### 16 dock doors
### For rapid throughput
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/flag-ico.svg)
###### ≤1 hour border crossing
### Under C-TPAT FAST lane
From our McAllen Cross-Dock, we streamline cross-border recovery for customers across North America. As Reynosa’s twin hub, McAllen enables secure FAST-lane clearance, bonded storage, and flexible fulfillment — keeping programs moving with speed and certainty.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201192%20976'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  A secure cross-dock  on the U.S.–Mexico border
_McAllen serves as the gateway to Reconext’s largest repair site in Reynosa. With bonded storage, on-site customs brokerage, and integrated systems, the site reduces border delays and provides customers with faster turnaround, lower logistics costs, and full trade compliance._
##  Enabling secure, efficient cross-border programs
Over the past several years, McAllen has proven itself as more than a warehouse — it’s the keystone of North American recovery logistics.
Reduced average border clearance to ≤1 hour with C-TPAT FAST lane
Cut turnaround times by days through daily consolidated flows with Reynosa
Delivered advance exchange and B2B fulfillment directly from U.S. soil
Eliminated redundant inland storage for OEMs, saving on transport and handling
Scaled to support multi-customer flows across computing, CPE, POS, and consumer tech
##  How We  Help You Win
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Keep goods moving
Cross-dock services with bonded storage and customs clearance.
![Keep parts flowing](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Fulfill orders fast
Advance exchange, B2B, and B2C fulfillment integrated with Reynosa.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Store with confidence
5,700 pallets and 13,000-unit library racks with fire suppression and backup power.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2050%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Simplify customs
In-house broker services and pre-cleared documentation cut delays.
![Bring devices back to life](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Integrate programs
Daily hand-offs with Reynosa ensure smooth program launch and steady-state volumes.

###  Always-on Security
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

###  Find Us
McAllen is located directly on the U.S.–Mexico border, minutes from Reynosa. With bonded storage, a customs broker on-site, and 16 dock doors, the site provides seamless integration with Reconext’s North American recovery network.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### Why use McAllen instead of direct shipments into Mexico? 
Because it eliminates inland border bottlenecks. McAllen manages customs, bonded storage, and FAST lane access, reducing clearance time to ≤1 hour and cutting overall turnaround by days.
##### Can McAllen support U.S.-based fulfillment directly? 
Yes. The site handles advance exchange, B2B, and B2C shipments directly from bonded storage, removing the need for third-party U.S. warehouses.
##### How does McAllen ensure compliance? 
The site is C-TPAT certified for trade security and uses in-house customs brokerage. Hazardous and environmental handling flows through Reynosa’s ISO 14001 and R2 certifications.
##### What kind of storage and capacity does McAllen offer? 
5,700 pallet positions and 13,000-unit library racks, supported by fire suppression, backup power, and secure dock operations.
##### Does McAllen integrate reporting with Reynosa? 
Yes. Customers can receive consolidated dashboards that combine McAllen throughput data with Reynosa repair and fulfillment KPIs, ensuring a single view of program performance.

#  Memphis, Tennessee Where enterprise hardware gets a second life
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico-1.svg)
### Facility
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/device-ico.svg)
### Devices processed each quarter
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/frame-ico.svg)
###### >90%
### Yield rates
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/global-ico-1.svg)
### Global certifications
With advanced automation and a seasoned operations team, Memphis handles high-volume screening, refurbishment, and parts recovery for enterprise IT and security equipment, keeping assets in play across the U.S.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201242%202208'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  Built for  scale, security, and speed
_Opened in January 2025, the Memphis site was designed to ramp fast and integrate seamlessly with U.S. logistics. Its footprint supports high test density, automation, and controlled material flow, so programs launch cleanly and scale predictably_
##  Built to deliver from day one
Memphis has quickly proven itself as a reliable recovery hub, hitting scale and certifications within its first year of operation.
~50K devices/quarter securely processed
3.5K units/day across shifts at steady state
90–92% recovery yield; ~80% first-pass success
20 tons/quarter corrugate recycled
##  How We  Help You Win
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Make returns seamless
RMA screening, functional testing, and secure system-level refurbishment.
![Keep parts flowing](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Protect sensitive data
Certified systemic data wipe with auditable logs; physical destruction of non-erasable devices.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2051%2044'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Recover more from components
Parts harvesting, refurbishment, and reuse across enterprise hardware and security systems.
![See what’s still good](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Bring automation onto the floor
High-density test stations, optical grading, autonomous mobile robots, and RFID-enabled tracking.
![Bring devices back to life](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Support specialized devices
Testing and recovery for alarm systems, smart devices, and connected home units.
##  Who we serve  and what we handle
Memphis serves enterprise IT and security programs across the U.S., with recovery, repair, and logistics for computing, data-center hardware, and connected systems.
###  We Process
  * ![Computing devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Computing & enterprise hardware 
Desktops, laptops, servers, storage hardware tested, refurbished, and redeployed to program standards
  * ![Computing devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Security systems
Alarms, sensors, cameras, control units repaired, validated, and staged for field service.
  * ![POS & payment systems](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2037%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Smart devices
Connected home devices screened, functionally tested, and prepared for redeployment.
  * ![Consumer electronics](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2051%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Parts & components
Harvested, refurbished, and verified for reuse to reduce cost and lead time.


###  Always-on Security
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Certified to ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001, and R2v3, Memphis meets globally recognized standards for quality, safety, environment, and responsible recycling.
![People on Watch](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2052%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### People on Watch
CCTV across the site, security guards on duty, and badge-controlled access with visitor check-in.
![Eyes Everywhere](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Eyes Everywhere
Turnstile-controlled entries, electrified perimeter fence (planned 2025), and 24/7 monitoring.
![Tight Access](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2058'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Tight Access
Controlled inbound/outbound docks, segregated secure zones, and ESD-protected benches.
![Data Lockdown](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2043%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Data lockdown
Certified systemic data wipe with audit logs; failed wipes destroyed on site.
##  Recovering more than devices
Memphis follows a reuse-first model, ensuring most incoming assets avoid landfill.
![Certified handling](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Standards in place
ISO 14001 and 45001 alongside ISO 9001 quality; R2v3 responsible recycling.
![High repair yields](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Smarter materials
Reuse and recycling of inbound packaging; ~20 tons/quarter corrugate recycled.
![Solar & energy programs](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2055'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Second-life first
~90% of incoming devices are given a second life via refurb, redeploy, or parts harvesting.

##  A look inside  our Memphis operations
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
From Memphis, customers reach 75% of the U.S. within two days by ground, with seamless integration into Reconext’s global network.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### Can you integrate with our tooling and reporting? 
Yes, Memphis runs a disciplined operating cadence (weekly ops calls, QBRs) and works with shared trackers (e.g., Smartsheet/Plus/MSS) so program data, SLAs, and exceptions stay visible without extra lift.
##### What documentation do you provide for data handling? 
Certified wipe/eradication logs and destruction attestations are available on request, aligned to program requirements—kept with device serialization for traceability.
##### How do you scale for seasonal spikes or launches? 
The floor is built around modular test density and automated material movement; we expand stations and labor bands in planned steps without disrupting quality gates.
##### Do you support custom packaging, kitting, or labeling? 
Yes, Memphis supports kitting, custom packout, and labeling specifications, with QA checks embedded before outbound.
##### Is your distribution U.S.-only? 
Yes, Memphis currently serves U.S. programs and coordinates cross-site workflows with other Reconext facilities for broader coverage when needed.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

### Leadership tenure
From our base in Mexicali, we repair, refurbish, and redeploy electronics with speed, precision, and security. Working in tandem with our Tecnomex and Calexico sites, Gómez Morín anchors Reconext’s cross-border operations, keeping technology in use and value flowing.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202400%201600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  A cornerstone of Reconext Mexico
_Gómez Morín is one of Reconext’s longest-running facilities, supporting customers across North America with secure, high-quality recovery operations. Together with Calexico and Tecnomex, it forms a tightly integrated cross-border network, enabling faster turnaround, lower logistics costs, and reliable data protection._
##  Proven performance at scale
Over the past two decades, Gómez Morín has consistently delivered results for global recovery programs. With deep technical expertise and long-serving leadership, the site has grown into a trusted hub that anchors Reconext’s North American network.
Supported multi-country recovery and refurbishment programs
Expanded capabilities across computing, mobility, and connected devices
Scaled operations to handle millions of units annually
Shared best practices and trained teams across other Reconext sites
Maintained a leadership team averaging 15+ years tenure

##  A look inside 
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
Gómez Morín is located in Mexicali, Baja California, directly integrated with the Calexico cross-dock. This daily cross-border connection ensures fast turnaround, reduced logistics costs, and coordinated recovery across North America.
###  Your recovery questions, answered
##### How do you ensure secure data handling? 
All data-bearing devices are processed using on-site secure erasure tools that meet ISO 27001, NIST, IEEE, and DoD standards. Devices that cannot be wiped are physically destroyed under R2v3-certified processes.
##### Can you support high-volume seasonal peaks?
Yes. The site flexes headcount and production capacity to absorb seasonal surges or unexpected return volumes without compromising turnaround.
##### Is there a cleanroom environment on-site? 
Yes. The facility includes cleanroom capacity for sensitive device handling, supporting component-level recovery and failure analysis.
##### How does the site integrate with Calexico?
Inventory flows between Gómez Morín and Calexico daily, with cross-border fulfillment and returns balanced in real time to minimize logistics costs.
##### Can customers visit the site for audits or inspections? 
Yes. Gómez Morín regularly hosts customer audits and compliance checks, providing full transparency into recovery processes, data security measures, and environmental practices.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

_Tecnomex Plant 2 is engineered for throughput and consistency. With dedicated repair lines, secure handling zones, and deep warehousing capacity, the site delivers rapid turnaround and dependable quality while syncing daily with Calexico for cross-border fulfillment._

###  Find Us
Tecnomex sits in Mexicali, Baja California, and connects daily with the Calexico cross-dock for inventory balancing and cross-border fulfillment, cutting turnaround times and logistics costs across North America.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### What do you need to scope a new program?
Device mix, monthly volumes/seasonality, SLAs, data-handling requirements, shipping lanes, and reporting needs (unit-level serialization, wipe/destruction certificates, TAT dashboards).
##### How do pilots and ramp-ups work?
Define scope → run a controlled pilot on agreed SKUs → review KPIs (yield, TAT, NFF, RMA) → scale to steady-state with weekly governance.
##### Can you integrate reporting with our systems? 
Yes — serialized unit data and operational KPIs can be delivered in customer-specified formats; integrations are scoped during onboarding.
##### Can we audit on site?
Yes — Tecnomex regularly hosts audits/inspections under ISO 9001 (quality) and ISO 45001 (health & safety), alongside RBA and STPS compliance.

From our Mexico City Service Center, we deliver high-quality repair and refurbishment for POS and connected devices, alongside configure-to-order (CTO) and enterprise B2B fulfillment. Integrated into Reconext’s North American network, CDMX is built for precision, flexibility, and speed.

##  A specialized hub for POS and fulfillment
_Since opening in January 2021, the CDMX Service Center has expanded from launch operations to a specialized facility supporting repair, refurbishment, and enterprise-scale fulfillment. With dedicated lines for payment systems, configure-to-order assembly, and outbound distribution, the site delivers consistency and agility across the region._
##  Driving measurable outcomes
The Mexico City team has quickly established itself as a reliable partner for POS and fulfillment programs, scaling volumes and building capability year-over-year.
158,600 units configured, tested, and shipped in 2024
170,000 units forecasted for 2025
Proven record of >99% repair yield on POS and CPE board-level work
Seamless integration with Reynosa for training, onboarding, and technical support
Rapid repair launch with full QA validation and serialized tracking

##  A look inside

###  Find Us
CDMX is located in Mexico’s capital region, providing direct access to enterprise markets and integration into Reconext’s Mexico network. The site coordinates closely with Reynosa and Calexico for technical training, program onboarding, and regional fulfillment.
###  Your Recovery  Questions, Answered
##### What makes Mexico City different from other Reconext sites? 
CDMX is a specialist facility focused on POS and enterprise fulfillment. While sites like Reynosa and Mexicali handle broad device categories, CDMX combines repair expertise with configure-to-order and kitting, making it ideal for high-volume deployments and commercial device programs.
##### Can CDMX handle both repair and fulfillment for the same customer? 
Yes. Many programs combine in-region repair with outbound fulfillment. Devices can be refurbished, kitted, and shipped from the same site, reducing logistics costs and cutting turnaround from weeks to days.
##### How does CDMX manage quality for large POS fleets?
The site uses serialized QA tracking, X-ray validation, and BGA profiling to ensure board-level repairs meet standards. Every unit is logged and validated before redeployment, supporting audit requirements for payment devices.
##### What logistics advantages does Mexico City provide? 
Being in the capital region allows direct access to Mexico’s transport infrastructure and enterprise hubs. CDMX can ship rapidly to domestic markets and link into Reconext’s cross-border flows via Reynosa and Calexico.
##### Does CDMX support custom reporting and SLA tracking? 
Yes. The site provides detailed KPI dashboards covering turnaround time, repair yield, no-fault-found rates, and carbon savings. Reports can be customized or integrated into customer systems for real-time visibility.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

### Served across APAC
From our Penang Service Center, we support leading global OEMs in extending device lifecycles. With high recovery yields, strict security, and a strong sustainability record, Penang plays a critical role in Reconext’s global recovery network.
##  Strategic hub in APAC
_Penang provides end-to-end ITAD and recovery services with the advantages of a Free Trade Zone location, fast customs clearance, and strong links to Southeast Asia’s major transport corridors._
Customers benefit not only from free-trade advantages but also from integrated ERP-backed logistics, giving full visibility from inbound freight through warehousing, refurbishment, and outbound shipment.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20812%20812'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  A track record of  recovery at scale
Penang has become a launchpad for circular recovery in APAC — combining high-yield testing, advanced refurbishment, and ERP-backed logistics under one roof. The site’s capabilities go beyond standard ITAD, with teams reclaiming components that others discard, supporting global customers with consistent quality, and embedding sustainability into every process.
###  Here, our teams have:
96%+ recovery yields across HDD, SSD, NAND, DRAM, IT assets, and mobile.
Achieved a 100% audit pass rate for certifications, with zero breaches to date.
Supported 10 global customers with secure refurbishment and redeployment  
programs.
Recovered 9.4 tons of materials (plastics, metals, glass) through responsible  
processing.
Delivered Level 1–4 PCBA repair, advanced display relamination, and  
component recertification capabilities, enabling recovery of high-value electronics  
that most providers scrap.
Maintained leadership continuity with senior staff serving up to 25 years.

###  Always-on protection  for customer assets
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Penang maintains strict controls to safeguard customer data and intellectual property. All data-bearing devices are processed in secure, access-controlled zones by authorized staff, with full audit trails.
Erasure follows internationally recognized standards — including NIST 800-88, DoD 5220.22-M, and ISO/IEC guidelines — ensuring data is irretrievably destroyed. Devices that cannot be securely wiped are physically dismantled and destroyed before leaving the facility.

###  Environmental  responsibility
The Penang team embeds sustainability into every stage of recovery. Devices are refurbished or harvested for parts wherever possible — 83.85% of incoming units gained a second life in 2024 alone. Hazardous materials are managed by certified partners in full compliance with Malaysia’s DOE requirements, while site-wide initiatives such as LED lighting have already reduced electricity consumption by an estimated 35%.
The facility operates under ISO 14001 for environmental management, ISO 45001 for health and safety, and R2v3 for responsible recycling, ensuring every process meets the highest global standards.

##  A look inside  our Penang operations
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
Situated in Perai Free Industrial Zone, Penang works closely with local authorities (Customs, DOE, MIDA) and leverages Malaysia’s central APAC position for regional efficiency.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### Does Penang handle customer returns directly?
Yes, the site processes notebooks, mobiles, storage devices, and more for  
refurbishment, functional restoration, and secure data wipe.
##### What makes Penang different from other Reconext sites?
It specializes in high-yield storage and component recovery, with dedicated test  
platforms for HDDs, SSDs, NAND, and DRAM — hitting yields of 92–99% depending on  
the device.
##### How long does it take to process devices?
On average, 29 business days from receipt to outbound shipment.
##### How secure is my data at Penang?
All data-bearing devices are wiped in line with NIST 800-88, DoD 5220.22-M, and  
ISO/IEC standards, with full audit trails. The site has never had a data breach and has  
achieved a 100% audit pass rate.
##### Does Penang hold global certifications?
Yes, including ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001, NIST-certified erasure, R2v3, and  
ISO/IEC 27001 (in progress).
##### What happens to devices that can’t be reused?
Hazardous and non-recoverable components are sorted, managed by a certified DOE-  
trained officer, and sent to DSV for compliant recycling and disposal.

#### Consumer Electronics

For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

### Power Capacity 
From our base in Prague, we help the world’s biggest brands recover more value from their electronics – repairing, refurbishing, and redeploying devices with speed, precision, and security. 
##  15 Years of  Keeping Tech in Play
_For more than 15 years, Reconext Prague has been a trusted partner for secure electronics recovery in Europe. Strategically located for fast regional turnaround, the site processes everything from network gear to consumer devices, serving customers across multiple industries._
Our experienced leadership team not only delivers consistently high quality locally, but also shares proven best practices across all Reconext sites worldwide. 
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202880%201920'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  A Global Engine for Circularity & Recovery
Prague is more than a high-performing ITAD facility. It’s a central hub for circularity – a place where devices are securely processed, refurbished, and returned to use instead of ending up as waste. From here, our teams launch new recovery programs, solve complex operational challenges, and provide hands-on support to Reconext sites around the world. 
###  From this single hub, we’ve:
Led multi-site technology rollouts, sending experts overseas to launch and stabilize operations. 
Managed enterprise-scale programs and advanced electronics recovery across Europe, Asia, and the Americas. 
Rebuilt engineering, supply chain, and quality functions for high-volume manufacturing programs. 
Guided new market entry for emerging service operations. 
Provided finance leadership for multi-country business units.
Prague is deeply integrated into the Reconext network, contributing to shared enterprise tools across engineering, finance, supply chain, and quality. With most of its leadership team serving for over 15 years, the site offers stability, deep institutional knowledge, and a proven ability to deliver results across continents.

###  Find Us
From this central position, customers across Europe can access faster turnaround, lower logistics costs, and coordinated support from our worldwide network.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### How do you ensure customer data is completely destroyed? 
All data-bearing devices are processed using on-site secure erasure tools that meet or exceed ISO 27001, NIST, DoD, and WEEELABEX standards. Every device is verified, both automatically and manually, with full audit logs. Devices that fail erasure are physically destroyed before leaving the site.
##### Who can access data-bearing devices? 
Only authorized, security-cleared personnel with badge-controlled access to secure zones.
##### Can customers get proof of secure data erasure? 
Yes, we provide certificates of data destruction upon request, including detailed reports from the erasure tool used, compliant with international standards.
##### Do you follow industry compliance frameworks? 
Absolutely. Prague holds six global certifications covering data security, quality, environmental, and safety requirements.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

### Via C-TPAT FAST lane
From our Reynosa Service Center, we support global customers with high-capacity repair, refurbishment, and value recovery programs. Integrated with McAllen, TX, via a dedicated cross-dock, Reynosa ensures secure, efficient processing and cross-border logistics.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201417%20943'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  A hub for advanced recovery in northern Mexico
_Since 2004, Reynosa has grown into one of Reconext’s largest and most versatile facilities. With specialized infrastructure for computing, telecom, POS, solar, and industrial electronics, the site provides scalable, secure recovery and seamless integration into global supply chains._
##  Delivering value at scale
Over two decades, Reynosa has built a track record of quality, scale, and reliability.
Expanded to 196,000 ft² across repair, warehousing, and fulfillment
Consistently delivered high yields across computing, CPE, POS, and solar programs
Established advanced board-level repair capabilities, including PCBA repair, BGA re-balling, LCD repair, and cosmetic parts refurbishment
Supported global customer audits and certifications with a 100% compliance record
Delivered tailored customer programs for OEMs, telecom providers, insurers, and take-back partners
Integrated daily cross-border operations with McAllen to reduce turnaround and logistics costs

##  A look inside 
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
Reynosa is located in Tamaulipas, Mexico, directly integrated with McAllen, TX. Daily cross-border flows support faster turnaround, lower logistics costs, and coordinated recovery across North America.
###  Your recovery  questions, answered
##### Why is Reynosa strategically important in Reconext’s network? 
The facility sits on the U.S.–Mexico border and integrates daily with the McAllen cross-dock. This location gives customers faster customs clearance, access to the FAST lane under C-TPAT, and reduced logistics costs compared to inland sites.
##### How does Reynosa support program launches or transitions?
New customer programs often start in Reynosa because of its scale and engineering depth. The site runs pilot builds, validates test codes, and provides training for other facilities before ramping to full volume.
##### What kind of customer oversight is available?
Customers can conduct on-site audits, virtual walk-throughs, and live KPI dashboard reviews. Many programs also embed customer QA teams at Reynosa for ongoing oversight.
##### What workforce programs are in place to ensure stability? 
Reynosa has long-tenured leadership and invests in workforce retention through RBA-aligned labor practices, continuous training, and partnerships with local technical schools. This stability helps maintain consistent yields even during volume surges.
##### How does the site contribute to broader ESG goals? 
Beyond environmental certifications, Reynosa supports circularity by extending solar hardware lifecycles and by capturing data on waste diversion and energy use that customers can include in their own ESG reporting.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#  Suzhou, China Where China’s storage tech gets a second life
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico.svg)
### Facility
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/device-v1-ico.svg)

### Global awards for best   
service partner
From our base in Suzhou Industrial Park, we support the world’s top storage and electronics brands. HDDs, SSDs, servers, cameras, and headsets flow through our secure facility — tested, repaired, and redeployed with speed and precision to maximize recovery and protect data.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201414%201054'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  Trusted in China for over 20 years
_Since 2002, Reconext Suzhou has been a trusted partner for domestic returns and recovery. From here, we coordinate a network of 30 city-based service centers, providing fast in-country turnaround and value recovery for storage and electronics OEMs._
##  Recognized as a best-in-class partner
Suzhou has earned repeated recognition from major storage OEMs including Toshiba, Western Digital, and KIOXIA. Over the last decade, our team has:
Recovered 7.2 million devices, mostly HDDs and SSDs.
Refurbished or redeployed 56% of incoming units.
Maintained a 100% audit pass rate on data security and compliance checks.
Supported six global programs with direct shipments to five countries.
Delivered consistent leadership, with our site director serving for over 13 years.

##  Who We Serve  and What We Handle 
Suzhou supports leading OEMs and enterprises in storage, networking, consumer electronics, and IT. Our specialty is HDD and SSD recovery, where we provide full in-warranty and value recovery support.

###  Always-on  Protection
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Reconext Suzhou operates under strict security controls to protect data-bearing assets and high-value electronics. From the moment devices arrive, they are tracked, screened, and processed in controlled zones with procedures designed to eliminate risk of loss or data leakage.
![People on Watch](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2052%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### People on Watch
24/7 on-site security staff
![Eyes Everywhere](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Eyes Everywhere
CCTV across the facility
![Tight Access](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2058'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Tight Access
Controlled entry points with multiple metal gates
![Data Lockdown](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2043%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Data Lockdown
No-beep policy, certified data erasure, and destruction of failed devices
##  Recovering more than devices
Suzhou is certified to ISO 14001 and ISO 45001, and follows Reconext’s reuse-first approach. By reducing packaging waste, redeploying refurbished products within China, and cutting site energy use, the facility helps customers meet ESG goals while lowering its own footprint.
![Cosmetic reconditioning](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Smarter packaging
Incoming cartons, pallets, foam, and ESD bags are collected and reused instead of discarded.
![Certified handling](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Closer circulation
Recovered HDDs, SSDs, laptops, and printers are redeployed locally, reducing emissions tied to long-haul shipping.
![Reuse-first processing to minimize waste and landfill](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2057'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Lower footprint 
The site is pursuing projects to reduce hydroelectric consumption and drive ongoing efficiency gains.

##  Inside  Suzhou
Load More Media 
###  Find Us
Located in Suzhou Industrial Park, the site anchors Reconext’s China operations with 30 city-based service centers feeding into its recovery and logistics hub. Customers gain faster turnaround, lower logistics costs, and seamless integration with Reconext’s global network.
###  Your Recovery  Questions, Answered
##### How fast is turnaround at Suzhou?
Our average turnaround time is 2 business days, depending on device type and test requirements.
##### Does Suzhou handle global returns or just domestic?
Primarily domestic, but the site also supports select global programs with direct shipments into five countries.
##### What happens if an HDD or SSD cannot be securely wiped? 
Drives that fail certified erasure are physically destroyed under controlled procedures to ensure no data leaves the site.
##### How reliable is the recovery process? 
On average, 55% of devices are successfully refurbished or redeployed, with a first-pass success rate of 50%.
##### Can customers track devices through the process? 
Yes, every device is logged, serialized, and tracked from arrival through final disposition, with detailed audit reports available.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage

#  Tallinn, Estonia Building the machines behind recovery
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/facility-ico.svg)
### Facility
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/automation-ico.svg)

###### ISO 9001
### Certified for design & build activities
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/members-ico.svg)
###### Founding Member
### Estonian Electronics Association
From our Tallinn R&D Center, Reconext engineers design the automation, robotics, and AI platforms that power electronics recovery worldwide. A team of ~40 specialists has developed platforms now deployed across Europe, the Americas, and Asia — from CPE testers to AI-driven optical inspection.
![Reconext repairs and refurbishes laptops](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201000%20667'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##  From concept to global deployment
_Tallinn is Reconext’s dedicated R &D hub — a complete engineering site with software, electronics, and mechatronics engineers working alongside project managers, build technicians, and technical support. With design, build, and support functions under one roof, the center can take a solution from first sketch to production-ready deployment across the Reconext network. _
##  Innovation with global impact
Tallinn has become the launch point for many of Reconext’s most transformative technologies. The team has:
Advanced CPE automation — deploying Titan 3, next-gen RCU testers, and automated cleaning systems that scaled throughput across high-volume service centers.
Pioneered AI inspection — building Optiline platforms now deployed in multiple recovery programs, with dozens of units operating worldwide.
Delivered rollouts — from SpectrumX diagnostics and secure erasure to fully automated receiving lines and robotic cleaning systems for laptops across global facilities.

###  Always-on protection for customer IP
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2055%2037'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2016%2015'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

##  Environmental responsibility
Tallinn embeds circularity directly into its engineering practice. Components from end-of-life hardware are reused in new machine builds, offices operate paperless by default, and waste is sorted and recycled under Estonia’s strict regulations. These practices ensure the site contributes to Reconext’s broader ESG commitments while reducing footprint at every stage of innovation.
![Certified handling](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2046%2028'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

##  Specialists at the intersection of software, hardware, and design
_Tallinn brings together software, electronics, and mechatronics engineers supported by build technicians, project managers, and technical staff. The team’s academic depth — including PhDs in AI, physics, and electronics — combines with hands-on experience to deliver practical solutions that scale across Reconext’s global network. It’s a small team with global reach, shaping solutions used across continents._
##  A look inside 
Load More Media 
###  Rooted in Estonia’s tech ecosystem
Tallinn is a founding member of the Estonian Electronics Association and partners closely with Tallinn Technical University. By collaborating with local RF and embedded electronics firms, the center taps into one of Europe’s most advanced digital economies. These partnerships feed directly into Reconext’s global innovation pipeline, ensuring new platforms are grounded in both academic rigor and industrial know-how.
###  Your R&D  questions
##### Does Tallinn process customer returns?
No. Tallinn is an R&D hub that designs and builds the automation and test platforms used across Reconext service centers.
##### What solutions come out of Tallinn?
Automation systems, AI inspection platforms, certified erasure tools, and digital twin simulations.
##### Can platforms be customized?
Yes. We adapt throughput, coverage, and integrations to each program’s requirements.
##### How is IP protected? 
Strict access controls, documented sample handling, and ISO 9001-certified processes ensure designs and customer prototypes remain secure.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/other-customer-premise-1.svg)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/other-customer-premise-1.svg)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#  Reconext Markets
More industries are recognizing the value hidden in used devices. Reconext helps unlock it, supporting companies across the electronics lifecycle, from production and distribution to maintenance, use, and end-of-life.
![Networking Equipment](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/printer-ico-1.svg)
#### Consumer Electronics
#### Laptops, desktops, tablets, game consoles, cameras, AR/VR headsets, and wearables securely erased, tested, and refurbished to like-new condition for remarketing and resale.
View
![Set-Top Boxes / CPE ](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/other-customer-premise-1.svg)
#### Enterprise Network, Data & Storage
#### Routers, switches, servers, HDDs, SSDs, and storage arrays processed with ADISA-certified testing, secure erasure, and resale channels that recover more value from enterprise IT.
View
![AR & Wearables](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
#### Payment terminals, cash registers, scanners, kiosks, and backroom servers refurbished with PCI-compliant security and fast turnaround so retailers, banks, and acquirers keep equipment in service longer.
View
![POS Equipment](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment (CPE)
#### Set-top boxes, gateways, modems, ONTs, and VoIP devices tested with proprietary automation and refurbished under OEM standards for redeployment and subscriber use.
View
![Laptops & Mobile Devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
#### Servers, racks, storage systems, networking gear, PDUs, UPS units, and batteries de-installed, securely wiped, and routed for resale or certified recycling with full audit reporting.
View
![Servers & Storage Devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Internet of Things (IoT)
#### Smart home devices, industrial scanners, robotics, wearables, and smart meters securely tested, repaired, and refurbished to extend lifecycle and recover value across consumer and industrial IoT markets.
View
![IoT & Smart Devices](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
#### Smartphones, tablets, laptops, and wearables supported with trade-in, buyback, certified pre-owned resale, LCD recovery, and grade-enhancing refurbishment for maximum return.
View

Markets
Markets
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2057%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Consumer Electronics
Reconext offers solutions for consumer electronics that span the full spectrum of support requirements, including in-warranty OEM support, extended warranty support, retail returns support, subscription model support, remarketing and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Enterprise Network & Data Storage
For the past two decades, Reconext’s network service capabilities have proven that used network equipment, accessories, and parts can be reused for existing or new markets. Our enterprise network and data storage solutions are designed to support critically important operators, OEMs, and data centers.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Point-of-Sale Equipment
Reconext understands that retailers and point-of-sale equipment OEMs operate in an industry with a specific requirement for reverse supply chain velocity and security, so we built our POS equipment solutions with this firmly in mind.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2036%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Customer Premises Equipment
With decades of experience, Reconext is a market leader in automated, proprietary test technology that delivers objective functional, cosmetic, and diagnostic evaluations for Customer Premises Equipment like set-top boxes.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2042%2042'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Data Center Decommissioning
Increasing Reuse through Data-Driven Optimization
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### IoT
Whether in the home, the office, or out in the field, IoT devices are everywhere, and returns are growing just as fast. Reconext takes a practical approach: tailoring repair, refurbishment, and recovery processes to each device’s attributes and the business model it serves.
    * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2056%2056'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Mobile
Reconext handles the full lifecycle of smartphones and mobile devices. From trade-in and buyback programs to repair, refurbishment, and resale, we design solutions that protect ROI and keep products moving. Whether you need one service or an end-to-end program, we’ve got you covered.

#  Optiline AI-Powered Cosmetic Grading, Built for Recovery at Scale 
![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/optiline.png)
[![](https://www.reconext.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/tech-video-icon.svg)](https://www.reconext.com/test-solutions/optiline/#optizvideo)
##### Stop replacing components you don't need to replace
Your grading process is burning cash on phantom defects. Internal analysis showed manual operators were replacing up to 20% more cosmetic parts than specifications actually required because human judgment couldn’t consistently apply the standards.
Optiline’s automated cosmetic grading eliminates that invisible overgrading, cutting unnecessary replacements and reclaiming lost yield.
[Talk to an expert](https://www.reconext.com/contact/)
##### The hidden cost of subjective grading
Manual grading inherently has a costly consistency problem. One operator flags a unit for rework. Another would’ve passed it. Decisions change from shift to shift, hour to hour. 
Here’s the best manual grading can realistically deliver:
  * 75% max repeatability across operators
  * Decisions that drift over time and location
  * 20% more cosmetic replacements than specs require
  * No visibility into how actual calls compare to intended standards 


Operators tend to over-apply cosmetic rules to be safe. But that safety buffer means tossing usable parts and bloating your cosmetic inventory. 
OptiLine fixes this. AI-powered defect detection evaluates actual device condition, compares it to what the spec says should pass, and calls it objectively every single time.
##### Why AI grading outperforms manual inspection 
**Trained on 20,000+ samples that capture edge cases human training misses**  
Built using real-world annotated returns and synthetic defect images generated in NVIDIA Omniverse to catch defects operators consistently overlook.
**Proprietary lighting reveals defects invisible to standard inspection**  
Directional control and moving light wave techniques expose subtle blemishes that cause inconsistent human judgment calls.
**Flexible grading logic eliminates operator drift**  
Adjust standards dynamically based on region, customer tier, or product lifecycle stage, delivering the same precision every time.
**Automated work instruction cuts rework confusion**  
Integrates with ERP to direct cosmetic operators: swap top cover only, leave rear intact, etc. No more guessing what needs replacement.
##### Data Security and Traceability
  * **Serial-level documentation** Every cosmetic decision recorded with retrievable images for complete audit trails.
  * **Full traceability integration** ERP connectivity ensures automated workflows and real-time tracking.
  * **Version-controlled standards** Grading specifications mapped to customer requirements with change management.
  * **Analytics and optimization** Grafana dashboards enable QA teams to validate warranty claims and tune specs.

###  How Optiline  Eliminates  Grading Guesswork
### Clean
#### 01
Products are surface-cleaned manually or via automated wash before inspection. 
### Grade
#### 02
Robotic loading ensures precise positioning. 8 HD cameras with proprietary lighting capture defects human eyes miss. AI compares findings to your exact specification without subjective interpretation.
### Route
#### 03
Passed units continue directly to functional testing. Failed units route to rework with exact component-level replacement instructions. 
### Track
#### 04
Every decision recorded at serial level with retrievable images. Data flows to Reconext ERP for automated workflows and yield analysis via Grafana dashboards.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2058%2052'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###  Common Deployment  Questions
##### Why does OptiLine require controlled environments? 
Consistent grading demands calibrated lighting, precise camera alignment, and maintained hardware. Controlled facilities eliminate the environmental variables that cause grading drift in distributed setups. 
##### Can grading specs be tuned to different markets or ages? 
Yes. Standards can be dynamically adjusted based on region, customer tier, or product maturity. 
##### How are cosmetic operators guided?
ERP receives test results and flags which components require replacement based on zone- and defect-level analysis. 
##### What products is OptiLine compatible with?
Currently used for CPE, laptops, VR/AR headsets, and gaming consoles. Additional device classes under development. 
##### How long does it take to integrate a new product into OptiLine?
Approximately 20 working days including spec mapping, AI training, validation, and SOP updates.
